entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
